arabic_text: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
translation: They worship besides Allah those who have nothing to provide for them from the heavens and earth[48], nor are they capable of doing so.
footnotes: [48] i.e., rain from the sky or plants from the earth.
